document_data.name: ''Shuruppak's Plate''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shuruppak's plate''''' was a unique set of [[plate mail]] armor that once belonged to [[Shuruppak]], the former [[chosen]] of the dead god [[Gilgeam]].
document_data.Description: Despite its composition, the plate armor was surprisingly light.
document_data.Powers: Whomever wore ''Shuruppak's plate'' was granted supernatural speed and agility. They also gained partial protection against fire, whether magical or mundane in nature.
document_data.History: This armor was bestowed upon Shuruppak by Gilgeam himself, some time before the [[Time of Troubles]], and was worn when the chosen slew many of the deity's enemies. The armor was lost under unknown circumstances and made its way into the possession of the [[fire giant]] [[Yaga-Shura]].
